alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Simpson and east central Copiah Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mendenhall to Rockport. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mendenhall around 705 PM CDT. Pinola around 715 PM CDT. Sanatorium around 740 PM CDT. Magee around 745 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
